argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ishpg.p | |- P = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | ishpg.i | |- I = ( Itv ` G ) |
| 3 |  | ishpg.l | |- L = ( LineG ` G ) |
| 4 |  | ishpg.o | |- O = { <. a , b >. | ( ( a e. ( P \ D ) /\ b e. ( P \ D ) ) /\ E. t e. D t e. ( a I b ) ) } |
| 5 |  | ishpg.g | |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) |
| 6 |  | ishpg.d | |- ( ph -> D e. ran L ) |
| 7 |  | hpgbr.a | |- ( ph -> A e. P ) |
| 8 |  | hpgbr.b | |- ( ph -> B e. P ) |
| 9 |  | lnoppnhpg.1 | |- ( ph -> A O B ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( dist ` G ) = ( dist ` G ) |
| 11 | 1, 10, 2, 4, 3, 6, 5, 8 | #P_oppnid | |- ( ph -> -. B O B ) |
| 12 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 8, 9 | #P_lnopp2hpgb | |- ( ph -> ( B O B <-> A ( ( hpG ` G ) ` D ) B ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_mtbid | |- ( ph -> -. A ( ( hpG ` G ) ` D ) B ) |
